13.author: Atreaia
13.body: If I understood you correctly you just spam left click the item so the context menu inside of flea market opens to "filter by item" where your cursor is right?

13.author: Acceptable_Traffic62
13.body: shouldn’t even have to be this way tbh lol. not a fan of having insanely low global stock that can sell out in less than a second but it is what it is

13.author: Acceptable_Traffic62
13.body:
so you’re going to want to go into the flea and right click the item you want and click inspect. bring up the context menu that has the detailed description and enlarged picture. from here you can spam filter by item while you’re still in the flea menu and it’ll refresh. go a little bit slow on the spam though so you don’t trigger the bot detection checks. keep a finger on the Y key and when the buy option comes up, just press buy and then Y and you should get whatever you need. 

tbh it’s hard to explain and only really necessary to get the black keycard. most everything else you can just spam on reset and get what you need

13.author: Atreaia
13.body: Thanks for explaining that it was inspect menu!

16.author: GokuBlank
16.body: It uncaps your framerate, I have a 144hz monitor and my game can't reach 144 fps but uncapping it allows it to get higher if possible, I still have frame drops but on avg my frames are higher and on smaller maps the frames are very high. I am no computer nerd so I can't say what made my fps jump, but I followed that tutorial and my fps jumped by 10ish.

16.author: GameTechniqueTV
16.body: Basically nvidia on + boost does the same thing, maybe better. He just wants his stash full frames for some reason. Nothing really else of value in the video. So it’s a giant workaround. Not recommended for the average player. He barely goes through his settings and even Mis reads some of them. I love the dude as a fellow Canadian but this is not the vid lol

16.author: GokuBlank
16.body: He even says it's all preference, I was getting jumps in frames using Nvidia + boost, the jump down in frames when your computer can pull 100fps plus to 60 in the loot menus is annoying and noticeable and this cuts out frame drops for no reason. Idk man you do you but it helped my game run better and it'll probably help someone else's.

21.author: Key_Transition_6820
21.body:
I have died 5 times to m62 and m61 mixed on shoreline. People are activity running these rounds, and if you play on maps thats more pvp focus you will see it more. 

Like said lvl 5 armor is your only savior from this gun, but a 20 rd mag dump is not the same as 30 or 50. Lvl 4 is only ok for 3 shots because the lower the dur the better chance that the bullet will pen and bcp is 88 damage to your 85 chest. tier 4 armor is what most players are running with the exception of the 15%. 

This gun is definitely op and if you have the money to try it out I would do it. The recoil its got right now is comparable to an akm but the ability to unalive you faster with whatever round if you are wearing tier 4. With meta rounds tier 5 and 6 won't help in cqb, don't even have to aim for the head.

24.author: mmoarpgfps
24.body:
Disable real time protection from windows defender; disable a service called SysMain(it is superfetch) microsoft renamed to sysmain to make it look important(it isnt) and try playing. 

Formatting your windows cab help tremendously also if tge above doesnt help you.

24.author: Bad_Carma22

27.author: ditchedmycar
27.body: Yeah that happens more and more I think with the improvements to recoil again, just have to keep trying to hit those eyes shots yourself :) the shooting range has a lot of room to practice now and clean targets off as well. I like to practice 10-20 a/d strafe shoots with my gun on the back wall targets before I go into raid, so if I need to swing or shoot back on someone I’m already prepared for the recoil and it doesn’t surprise me

27.author: Agreeable-Eye-3351
27.body:
It was just an off angle and I had made a single noise. His response was perfect and he full sprinted to my position. It felt off and I just logged off. It was the second floor of that area between scav camp and sunken village on woods. I had the upper angle from the second story and guy full sprinted to a one tap. 

I'm not saying he was cheating but that was an awful lucky place to put yourself in and not clear anything down below. With audio how it is I can sorta understand it until he ran up the stairs for the best angle. Could have been legit or nah.

27.author: ditchedmycar
27.body:
To be honest you never know, he could be cheating the way he pushed past things like you said but sometimes people know spawns and timing very well too and know mathematically if they hear (you) then unless you are a group you might be the only spawn that could be there before him so he just pushes straight to you, I personally play super timing heavy for my pmc engagements to try and anticipate when there going to be where, you can use mapgenie.com and use the measurement tool and it will tell you how long it takes someone to cross a distance in the game via sprinting with a rifle, sprinting with just a pistol, or walking pace, so you can know the ranges of time someone might arrive into an area from their spawn, so you know if you are +15 seconds ahead of time, -15 seconds off pace, etc and know weather you can be extra aggressive and keep pushing up, or be ready for people to be in front of you already. It’s complex at first but one tip is to map out the route you want to take and then look how other spawns cross with it and start to take note of when you died in raid and from what spawn did they come from, and you can slowly piece together a mental image of how people are going to move around the map and might enable you to make a crazy decision like running past en entire floor because you believe it’s only 1 guy up there. 

Definitely could just be cheating too, it’s super prevalent in this game sometimes if you bring in better gear they will hunt you something to keep in mind

31.author: Vladliash
31.body:
Before you read:

I'm tired after work, English B2 with no practise lately.

Bitch with a “\*” is an interjection (like in cyka blyat I’d write bitch\* blyat)  
Blyat has many similar forms I wrote just blyat everywhere  
  
**Bad work:**   
\- that really hurts!  
\- finally a decent adversary;  
\- some real guys today, real;  
**Broken hand:**  
\- ah, ugh, why the hand?!  
**Broken leg:**  
\- Ah, bitch\*, that hurts!   
\- ah, ugh, why the leg?!  
**Enemy:**  
\- hey, zdorovo zaebal (there is no easy way to translate it. It is a greeting in style of Russian speaking Kazakh, recently became a meme because of popular Kazakh comic, kinda like wazzuuup in 2000s’)  
\- op-pa, hello there!  
\- hi there!  
\- welcome!  
**Enemy down:**  
\- get some, bitch!  
\- good luck!  
\- Kicked the bucket!  
**Enemy grenade:**  
\- Uuuu, blyat! \*Chuckling\* Running away! Running away!  
**Enemy hit:**  
\- How do you do there? Hurts? (talking like with a toddler)  
\- how is it there? Hurts?  
**Fight:**  
\- Here’s the place you go down;  
\- Booring;   
\- Let’s try again;  
\- all right, I’ll spare you;  
\- well come on, cheer up! I don’t know, change tactics or something!  
\- Your gun’s shit and  you yourself  is a looser;  
\- uuu, bitch\* blyat!  
\- Hey, last standing hero! I’m so glad, I’m so glad!  
\- wait up, bro, I’m not ready;  
\- come closer;  
\- Oh, I am really scared!  
\- get ready, looser!  
\- you cannot fucking hit me – I’m the Killa, blyat!  
\- if you fuck up my pants I’ll fuck you up!  
\- that was beautiful!  
\- \*mockingly imitates sounds of a toddler walking\* top-top-top-top  
**Fight end:**  
\- I love this job!  
\- hey! Is anybody alive here?!  
**Fight start:**  
\- warm-up, gonna whoop some ass soon  
\- so, gonna fight?  
\- good evening;  
\- that’s a good start of the day;  
\- dear guests have arrived.  
**Good work:**  
 \- no, that’s fucking boring;  
\- that’s lame;  
\- when I’m gonna get a decent warrior to fight?  
**Grenade:**  
\- Here a grenade for you banderlog (might be translated two ways – one is a monkey from a Maugli book, other touches politics. I really hope they didn’t mean the second)!  
\- How do you like that?  
\- a present for you!  
**Hurt near death:**  
\- Beautiful, Beautiful..  
\- Fucked me up  
**Lost Visual:**  
\- come out, I’ll find you anyway  
\- hid somewhere? Come out!  
**Mutter:**  
\- Where are you, bro?  
\- uuu, unpleasant bitches  
\- hm, I hope I get lucky and meet someone worthy today  
\- Ok, ok, I like this place, there was a Macdonald’s once   
\-  What in the hell they come here for?  
**Need ammo:**  
\- damn, am I empty?  
**Weapon broken:**  
\- oooo, that was unexpected  
\- op-pa, shot out  
**Weapon Jammed:**  
\- Ok, ahahah!  
\- Ahhhh, that bitch!

Cs:go has entirely predictable recoil that is completely controllable to the point that the ak is an actual laser beam long range if you're good.

The first 5 shots or so in Valorant are completely laser accurate which isn't even true depending on the MoA of the gun in Tarkov. Whoever headshots first wins in that game.

You're trying to paint high recoil as a skill, it's not if it's completely rng based like the former recoil system was. It was just an rng fiesta. Honestly you just sound like a salty ass bad player to be honest.

And yes, less recoil or no recoil shifts the skill to map knowledge, movement, positioning, and when to engage, which is my entire point of using quake as an example. Rats that complain are bad at those things which is why they want a higher recoil rng fiesta.

You either die or you get shots in. With single fire you dont have the time to aim and fire in fights. With Auto you just fire and hope dat some shots connect. Well thats atleast how i do and in many Cases it works great.

41.author: FrankDanger
41.body:
Yeah you can have a map open in Opera GX and limit it to 50mb and your game should run a little better than with Chrome open. 

Not sure what CPU you have so can't comment on your performance in Rust.

41.author: FrankDanger
41.body:
That should handle Rust just fine. Might just be running out of RAM when you have issues. 

If you have good RAM it has a setting called XMP which you need to turn on if you want the RAM to run at the correct speed. Many novice PC builders miss this step.

41.author: Mefju2137
41.body: Tbh i have a prebuild becouse i dont know that much to build it by my self. I have RAM PNY XLR8 16GB 3200MHz. Can tell me how do i check if it is running at the correct speed?

41.author: FrankDanger
41.body:
I use a program called CPU-Z. 

Click the "memory" tab and look for "DRAM Frequency"

If you have 3200 mhz RAM it will show 1600 mhz as the speed. Any lower than 1600 and you do not have XMP enabled. 

Make sure at the top right it says "Dual" for the Channel #.

You can also just check in your BIOS to see if it is enabled or disabled.

41.author: Mefju2137
41.body:
I dont want to ask for too much but i dont understand shit from this can u add me on discord and i will send u screen shots or meaby i can screen share you in a call?  
Gnomi#1580

41.author: FrankDanger
41.body:
[here is a guide with pictures](https://www.drivereasy.com/knowledge/how-to-check-ram-speed-quickly-easily/)

Use method 3 for the best results.

Ignore method 4 and anything it says below that.

41.author: Mefju2137
41.body: Soo if it is around 1596 for me its fine??

41.author: FrankDanger
41.body: Yeah, that means you're running at the correct speed (3200 mhz).

44.author: LessFluffy
44.body:
\- Level 10 Sniper is easy if you didn't waste your Sniper Quest reward exp, just spamm mosin reload each lobby

\-500meter scav kill just go lighthouse and sit on some mountain

\- 50pmc kills streets easiest by far just play the game normally

\- All tasks idk which are in there if it's 25x sturman and stuff like that it might be painful.

​

Only Woods and Lighthouse area kills are rough but they increased the radius recently and if you really wanted to you can go on a dead server and queue up with friends at nighttime and kill each other. Yeah cheesy but as mentioned above. We're not comparing things on how hard they are.

​

It's just that lab is a terrible map. It's by far the least liked map by the majority of players.

44.author: chrisashley91
44.body:
Just for reference this is my 7th wipe, 5.2k hours level 65-70 each wipe.

Level 10 sniper is not as easy as it once was. You don’t get +1 +3 +1 levels anymore. It’s all fractions of that. 40 mosin reloads per raid get you 2.4 skill points, 3 points at 80 reloads.

I’m guessing you don’t have much experience. There is no sniper scavs on lighthouse..

Yes 50 kills on streets is not hard. But that’s just 10% of the quests in total just for LK.


It’s not every single task but you need to complete around 160ish total (could be off a little on that not 100% but it’s close)

The average person who has LK is level 55+ and in line with kappa (not needed for LK line)

To justify saying doing ALL this is better/easier/smarter/logical. Plus spending 8m (or whatever it is exactly) to craft the item in place of running 1-20 labs tops to get both items (not just one) is absolutely absurd.

44.author: LessFluffy
44.body:
\- as you said just spamm reload during raids only need to get to lvl 7ish to make it lvl 10 with the quests. 

"I’m guessing you don’t have much experience. There is no sniper scavs on lighthouse.."

You never mentioned it has to be a **sniper scav.** so maybe you lack experience in writing things.

\- Customs is a good map for that easy visible sniper scav across half the map.

Shroreline might work as well

\-----------------

# as Mentioned above I did not compare these two things with each other. 

# (you're making me write it down 3 times now in case you forgot already)

# Using title font so you wont miss it this time (hopefully)

All I said was the map is not fun at all and someone that does not play/want to play it won't get the item in 1-20 runs without knowing every single item spawn, player spawn.

53.author: Bardy_
53.body:
Gunpowders have been getting pretty expensive recently, but I'm pretty much cycling 7.62 BP, M995, and .300 AP, depending on whichever I have the least of. But really M995 and .300 AP are personal choices - the MCX is kinda eh, I only use it for style points. And M856A1 is generally good enough for .556 weapons (and is better than M995 for scav kills due to the 40+ damage, allowing it to always one tap scavs).

As such, the overall best thing to craft is probably green gunpowder > 7.62 BP on repeat. The BP craft is the only source of excellent ammo for the RD-704 and Mutant, if you have either unlocked. And the green gunpowder craft is an easy way of getting green gunpowder cheap for the BP craft.

But if you're not looking for high-tier ammo, magnum buckshot is pretty solid if you like to run shotguns. Otherwise, you can just cycle the most profitable crafts as per [Tarkov Guru.](https://tarkov.guru/hideout-profit/)

53.author: Itirpon

53.author: Bardy_

53.author: Bardy_
53.body: Oh yeah it looks like they're very similar. I used [this mid-tier build on the 103](https://imgur.com/a/HRCMPhp) until I unlocked the Mutant/RD, but the same build is basically identical on the 104, but is a bit less accurate and 700 grams lighter. However, the AK-104 does have a slightly higher hidden camera recoil stat - [see here.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/105XpSzy16WaWugJW8XdQppr3LmFgHhxKTa7gjUZRpWA/edit#gid=0)

55.author: moose_338
55.body: Then make it work on interchange, you can get from mid mall to emercom in under three mins that leave 5 for looting.

55.author: Dereck1804
55.body:
Ok, if you must have the full details. I spawned where the scav/pmc extract is with 8 minutes left. It would take 2 minutes to get through Oli from spawn just from sprinting. I might be able to loot a shelf or 2 and then hit Emercom maybe by 1 minutes mark. That is just unreasonable. So instead I just decided to try the stashes near railway extract, but of course since everyone knows them, they were looted. 

I understand you're devils advocate, but there's a point where its just annoying

55.author: moose_338
55.body: Your handed a zero risk scav kit for free take what you can get. Or learn to run it as a PMC and make millions because your not picking over everyone's leavings

56.author: woods_GOAT
56.body: If you want over 100 frames on every map on 1440 it is.

56.author: P_f_M
56.body:
It's the IMC paired with fast RAM what makes things possible...

CPU freq is secondary...

56.author: woods_GOAT
56.body: Ok i concede that. But doesn’t a fast memory controller go hand in hand with a high core speed cpu?

56.author: P_f_M
56.body:
Yes and no... I used to have a i5-8600K oced to 5.1 GHz with 3200MHz RAM and eft ran more trash than a 3900x fixed at 4.3GHz all core, with the same memory and same timings and i gave EFT only 6 cores...

Wierdest example was a w3680 oced to 4.5ghz, but with a 2133 IMC (and that was tuned to oblivion to even get it running there) and EFT was running the same like on a stock 6700

If we talk "socket fixed" as example... 1200 Xeon E with a lower cpu frequency will have more optimized IMC than a Core...

Not that you were wrong in terms that newer CPU which can clock closer to 5ghz will be better (as it seems that for few years the clock race was kinda forgotten) , but statement "CPU that can hit close to 5ghz will be better" is a tiddy bit off...

56.author: woods_GOAT
56.body: I see. Well thank you for the explanation.

57.author: ChocoPieJay
57.body:
So what i’m saying is.. you heard him outside in the bushes and that’s what made you stop moving, but that entire floor is clomping wood sound.. so when he was outside.. he clearly heard that you were inside.. he enters the building below you.. searches the first floor completely, you’re not there, so he comes up to second floor and the obvious spot that most people stand is behind the curtains when they’re ratting.. at this point i’d say you’re ratting since you heard a bush outside and then you completely stopped moving for over 60 seconds.. would love to see his perspective since you said he’s TTV.. DM it to me so I can see the opposing viewpoint..

the only thing suspect is that he hits you through curtain.. and that’s either radar or pure luck.. hard to say.. i understand where you’re coming from..

57.author: Ukymik3
57.body:
there was no bush sound i just thought i heard something and stopped moving then he started walking in the bunker below and opened the door  


wouldnt have stopped moving if i never thought i heard bushes. if u want the full clip ill give it to ya but theres not much else other than me looting black bish

i’m simply replaying the scene that you described
